entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:03 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
